page.title: 07Chapman's by Jason H
page.content:
My house is about 100 years old. It was built in 1890 and was lived in by a family until 1910 when the Chapman family moved in.A few months later they turned it into a butcher's shop.Their meat was pretty good and they made quite a success of their business although it was not the only butcher's shop in Halling They called it Chapman's.A few years later Chapman's closed down.
Then a family bought the shop and turned it into a house.Our house has a cellar.It also has a little room built into the right hand side wall.Just before you go into it,you look up towards the ceiling.Hanging on a rusty metal bar there are two rusty old meat hooks which the Chapmans used to use when it was a butchers shop.
